${ModID}:StrengthStorm.NAME: Strength Storm
${ModID}:StrengthStorm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Power card, gain 1 Strength.

${ModID}:DoubleUp.NAME: Double Up
${ModID}:DoubleUp.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a power card without exhaust, create a copy of it with exhaust in your discard pile.
${ModID}:DoubleUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play a power card without exhaust, create a copy of it with exhaust in your discard pile.

${ModID}:SustainedOffence.NAME: Sustained Offence
${ModID}:SustainedOffence.DESCRIPTION: At the end of each turn, deal !M! Damage to a random enemy, increased by Strength.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: At the end of each turn, deal
Damage to a random enemy, increased by Strength.

${ModID}:SustainedDefence.NAME: Sustained Defence
${ModID}:SustainedDefence.DESCRIPTION: At the end of each turn, gain !M! Block, increased by Dexterity.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: At the end of each turn, gain

${ModID}:BranchOut.NAME: Branch Out
${ModID}:BranchOut.DESCRIPTION: Fleeting. NL Choose 1 of !M! powers from packs not available in your draft to add to your hand and deck.

${ModID}:PowerfulCharge.NAME: Powerful Charge
${ModID}:PowerfulCharge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Reduce the cost of a random power in hand by 1 this combat.

${ModID}:Fractal.NAME: Fractal
${ModID}:Fractal.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength, Dexterity and Focus. NL Can be upgraded any number of times.

${ModID}:Jettison.NAME: Jettison
${ModID}:Jettison.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Discard 1 card. NL If you discarded a power, draw !M! cards.
${ModID}:Jettison.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL You may discard 1 card. NL If you discarded a power, draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:DebilitatingStrike.NAME: Debilitating Strike
${ModID}:DebilitatingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Apply !M! Weak.

${ModID}:ExploitWeakness.NAME: Exploit Weakness
${ModID}:ExploitWeakness.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply a debuff, gain !M! Vigor. Add 1 *Debilitating *Strike to your hand.
${ModID}:ExploitWeakness.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply a debuff, gain !M! Vigor. Add !${ModID}:m2! *Debilitating *Strikes to your hand.

${ModID}:GrowingMomentum.NAME: Growing Momentum
${ModID}:GrowingMomentum.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] next turn. NL Whenever you play a Power card, gain [E] next turn.
${ModID}:GrowingMomentum.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] and draw 1 card next turn. NL Whenever you play a Power card, gain [E] and draw 1 card next turn.
